title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1368/95 of 16 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2921/90 on aid for the production of casein and caseinates from skimmed milk
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EC) No 1368/95 of 16 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2921/90 on aid for the  production of casein and caseinates from skimmed milk
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
'ANNEX III COMPOSITION REQUIREMENTS Caseinates with a milk protein content not including casein of not more than 17  % of total milk  protein content >TABLE>
